titles.title: E-Cigarette Device Standards Act of 2019
E-Cigarette Device Standards Act of 2019
A bill to establish standards for the design of electronic nicotine delivery systems.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
E-Cigarette Device Standards Act of 2019
This bill requires the Food and Drug Administration to establish design standards that prevent consumers from modifying electronic nicotine delivery systems (e.g., e-cigarettes and vape pens) or their components.
